items.name: Arcana
items.description: A domain of raw, enigmatic power used to bend energy and the elements.

items.name: Blade
items.description: A domain of martial precision and the skill to end fights with steel.

items.name: Bone
items.description: A domain of bodily mastery, resilience, and the thin line of life and death.

items.name: Codex
items.description: A domain of recorded knowledge, equations of power, and practiced study.

items.name: Grace
items.description: A domain of charm, performance, and shaping perception through presence.

items.name: Midnight
items.description: A domain of obscurity, clever tricks, and the cloak of night.

items.name: Sage
items.description: A domain of earth's power, natural balance, and hard-won wisdom.

items.name: Splendor
items.description: A domain of life, healing radiance, and the power to defy death.

items.name: Valor
items.description: A domain of courage, defense, and shields held against the odds.
